__e: And it wasn't the reason, why I hated grandfather.
When you were a boy, you hated your brother... your move, professor.
And I speak as one who has hated the same man as you hate now.
He said I hated my mother!
She tells you she can't have a stable relationship... because she hated her mother.
I've been protecting him since that conversation on the train when he told me how much he hated his wife.
For 10 years I've lived with that thought and hated it.
I've hated it since the first day I had anything to do with it.
- You told me you hate him.
He was raised by a sister, who I believe hated him too. Although, she certainly never knew it.
'He said he hated you and you were responsible for everything.'
You're the first one I know to begin by hating him and end up liking him.
The truth is, I hated his guts. He didn't like me.
─ Deputy head, my deputy foot. We're on holiday now.
You've always known it's true, and you hated me for it.
I knew she hated me for that worst of all.
